question:
Recently, India has decided to procure S-400 missile system to augment its military capabilities.  With this reference, consider the following statements:  
  1. S-400 missile system is an air defence missile system developed by Russia.
  2. S-400 is capable of destroying both cruise and ballistic missiles.
  3. S-400 is capable of firing three types of missiles to create a layered defence and can simultaneously engage 36 targets.
Which of the above is / are correct statements?
explanation: All the statements above correspond to the features of the S-400 defence system. India has inked $5.43 billion (Rs 40,000 crore) deal for five advanced S-400 surface-to-air missile squadrons with Russia. There is a threat that the United States of America might exercise sanctions on India for trading with Russia.
